pageProduct.name: Scholl Callous Hard Skin Manual File
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Scholl Callus File instantly removes the build up of callus and hard skin. With fine and coarse sides, it is hygienic and durable.

Scholl Callus File effectively removes hard skin and callus due to its different abrasive surfaces. With its specially designed handle, any area of the foot can be treated without difficulty.

Size: 1 Pack

Warnings

Keep out of reach of children.

For use on hard and callused skin on the feet only. Use only on dry skin.
Stop using if skin becomes sore or inflamed. People suffering from diabetes or poor blood circulation are recommended to seek medical advice before using this product. Do not use if skin is broken or irritated.
If dropped onto a hard surface, the metal heads may become dislodged. The metal components may have sharp edges, so replace with care.

Directions

First use the coarse side to remove more severe callus and then the finer side to rub away hard, rough skin. In order to prevent rough hard skin from building up again, use a moisturising product such as Scholl Velvet Smooth Essential Moisture Cream.

USAGE ADVICE

Do not remove the metal heads. Just use a stiff brush.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 1 PET(E)| 21 PAP
